lines.text: Somebody once said San Francisco is a great city as long as you don't mind running into the same six people over and over again.
People who are tragically ambitious and smart go to New York and people who are just tragically smart come here.
Oh. Well what about people who are just tragically ambitious?
Well, at least I have potential. It's a wonderful thing, potential. Because as long as I don't do anything, I'll still have it.
